body: So, y'know, ask me stuff. (Is that how you do this? xD)
body_tagged: So, y'know, ask me stuff. (Is that how you do this? xD)
title: The Gray Eyed Kid's first ever AMA!

replies.body:
http://pastebin.com/FxCMAk3Z
GG :)
replies.body_tagged:
http://pastebin.com/FxCMAk3Z
GG :)

replies.body:
Oh, god, Adrian xD
Classic Goldie questions, go!
1. What's your favorite color and why?
2. If you had one wish to benefit yourself (No donating to charity or anything), what would it be?
3. What do you think the meaning of existence is?
4. Can you easily do 56/24 in your head? (In under 10 seconds)
5. Is your power level over 9000? 
6. If you were a food, what would you be and why?
7. If you were to use a common household object to fight in the zombie appocolypse (Microwave, chair, et cetera), what would it be and why?
8. If you could choose to be an animal and still had the power to morph back into a human any time you wanted, what would it be and why?
replies.body_tagged:
Oh, god, Adrian xD
Classic Goldie questions, go!
1. What's your favorite color and why?
2. If you had one wish to benefit yourself (No donating to charity or anything), what would it be?
3. What do you think the meaning of existence is?
4. Can you easily do 56/24 in your head? (In under 10 seconds)
5. Is your power level over 9000? 
6. If you were a food, what would you be and why?
7. If you were to use a common household object to fight in the zombie appocolypse (Microwave, chair, et cetera), what would it be and why?
8. If you could choose to be an animal and still had the power to morph back into a human any time you wanted, what would it be and why?

replies.body:
I'll do the first 20 but that's it. xD

  1. 1) Whats your (full) name? Zach (LOL nope .-.)
  2. 2) How old are you? 12
  3. 3) Whats your Birthday? Feb 16th, 2002.
  4. 4) What starsign does that make it? Wut?
  5. 5) Whats your favourite colour? Blue.
  6. 6) Whats your lucky number? 3.
  7. 7) Do you have any pets? 2 dogs 2 cats.
  8. 8) Where are you from? Ohio, USA.
  9. 9) How tall are you? 4' 11''.
  10. 10) What shoe size are you? 5.5 US.
  11. 11) How many pairs of shoes do you own? 2.
  12. 12) If you were prime miniser/ruler of the world what laws would you make? IDK.
  13. 13) If you were a super hero what powers would you have? Gray Eyes Laser Vision! xD. Actually I'd like the abilities of Pyro from the X-Men, and flight. And invisibility. And maybe Immortality.
  14. 14) and what would your hero name be? Zach. xD
  15. 15) and what outfit would you wear? Normal clothes.
  16. 16) What was your last dream about? Interesting stuff. :)
  17. 17) What would you do if you won the lottery? Well, winning the lottery could be anywhere from winning $2 to $5,000,000. xD
  18. 18) Would you like to build/design your own house? Maybe.
  19. 19) Which form of public transport do you prefer? I like cars.
  20. 20) What talents do you have? I'm the best at, being the best at nothing. PARADOX!

replies.body:
1. What's your favorite color and why? Blue, because it is.
2. If you had one wish to benefit yourself (No donating to charity or anything), what would it be? What?
3. What do you think the meaning of existence is? 42.
4. Can you easily do 56/24 in your head? (In under 10 seconds) No. xD
5. Is your power level over 9000? http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SiMHTK15Pik
6. If you were a food, what would you be and why? Well, humans could be hunted by a lot of animals, so if we're prey, then, I already am food! :D
7. If you were to use a common household object to fight in the zombie appocolypse (Microwave, chair, et cetera), what would it be and why? Just, y'know, your average Zombie Repellent (self-regenerating) :D
8. If you could choose to be an animal and still had the power to morph back into a human any time you wanted, what would it be and why? Grizzly Bear, because Grizzly Bear.

Hello, Gray Eyed kid! I'm the Red Eyed kid!
My question is...
If I give you one of my red eyes, will you give me a gray eye in exchange? :O

replies.body:
What would you do
if you suddenly woke up
and went to the bathroom
and found out
that your gray eyes
turned BLUE
replies.body_tagged:
What would you do
if you suddenly woke up
and went to the bathroom
and found out
that your gray eyes
turned BLUE

replies.body:
Actually, that happens alot! :O

See, my eyes shift on a fine line between gray and blue. Usually, my eyes will be blue if I'm outside or taking a shower, that kinda stuff, but if I'm inside all day on a computer, or sleeping, my eyes are pretty much steel gray.

MIND BLOWN

replies.body:
Hurru gray eyed kid, this is the cyan eyed kid. People call me clockracer for short. I got some questions for you.

1. Favorite fruit?
2. Favorite Vegetable?
3. Favorite map for each minigame (Avicus)

Bai Bai.

replies.body:
Now say brown eyes are the dominant trait and gray eyes are the recessive trait. You have gray eyes and you marry a brown-eyed hot Asian. She is a oriented dominant. You are purebred recessive. Now say you have a child. What is the chance of having a gray eyes child?

If you don't get it I'll tell you what the chance is.

@Clocky

1. Favorite fruit? Apple.

2. Favorite Vegetable? Corn.

3. Favorite map for each minigame (Avicus) Nebula: Senex. CTH: The Fall. Elim: No maps, just randomly generated. The Walls: Village. Avicade: Hellbound, for Minotaur. Nexus: I don't play Nexus.
